creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: circular breast plate adornment; center has a rather large sphere; sphere is surrounded by four identical panels with a single butterfly in each one; background of tiny dots; panels separated by strips of silver with dots in relief; two rings of T-shaped fringe curve in toward the center, run around the outside; back of plate has a pin-like piece on it
title: Breast plate adornment
